bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Design of Cable Raceway Systems for Electric Generating Facilities
IEEE Guide for the Design of Cable Raceway Systems for Electric Generating Facilities

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidance for the design and installation of cable raceway systems for all types of electric generating facilities is provided. Recommendations, methods, and best engineering practices for the design of cable raceway systems including selection of equipment, materials, and the configuration of raceway are described.

Guidance for the design and installation of cable raceway systems for all types of electric generating facilities is provided. Recommendations, methods, and best engineering practices for the design of cable raceway systems including selection of equipment, materials, and the configuration of raceway are described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
